text:
2006 paper suggests that #chloroquine inhibits the biosynthesis of sialic acid, it may explain the effects of chloroquine on HIV and SARS #coronavirus (sialic acid moieties are present in HIV-1 glycoproteins and SARS coronavirus receptor ACE2) https://t.co/KzU6dp2P6p

#glycotime https://t.co/rottDmSPU2
